summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of SoundMirror web preview MVP. All 13 specified features tested successfully including dual-head animator, phoneme timeline, playback controls, navigation, and bug reporter functionality.
passed_tests: Home page loads with SoundMirror branding and word input
Language selector dropdown works (5 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Arabic)
Suggested words are clickable and navigate to practice page
Practice page shows dual-head animator (Front View + Side View)
Playback controls: Play/Pause button toggles correctly
Speed control buttons work (0.25x, 0.5x, 0.75x, 1x)
Phoneme timeline displays correctly for word 'hello' (H, E, L, L, O)
Letter Practice page shows phoneme grid (12 phonemes)
Selecting a phoneme shows articulation details and animator
Progress page shows stats (Total Practices, Average Score, Streak)
Bug Reporter page has category dropdowns (5 categories)
Navigation sidebar works for all 5 pages
Offline indicator shows green status
Complete bug report submission flow with subcategories
Custom word input and navigation (tested with 'beautiful')
Language switching with different suggestions
Quick navigation buttons (Letters and Progress)
Back button functionality
Phoneme timeline interaction
Reset and mute functionality
Colored shape placeholders for sprite animation system
